title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
Meet the soundcore by Anker Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds—made to help you fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and wake up gently.

Easy comfort for all night:
- Very small and light. They don’t stick out, so they’re comfortable even if you sleep on your side.
- Soft ear tips and little “wings” help them stay in place all night.

Quiet, calm rest:
- 4-Point Noise Masking System helps cover common nighttime sounds like snoring, traffic, or a humming fan.
- Smart volume control: if your room gets louder, the earbuds gently raise the sleep sound to keep things calm.
- Note: These do not use active noise cancelling. The seal and soothing sounds do the work.

Soothing sounds built in:
- Use the free soundcore app to play white noise, gentle waves, rain, and more.
- Special speakers are tuned for relaxing, low, soft sounds that help you drift off.

Sleep help that’s simple:
- The earbuds can tell when you’ve fallen asleep and pause the audio automatically.
- Sleep monitor gives easy feedback on how long and how well you slept (view in the app).
- Personal alarm wakes only you, so you won’t disturb your partner.

Reliable and easy to use:
- Bluetooth 5.2 for a steady connection.
- Best used indoors (bedroom or quiet room) for the most comfortable, reliable experience.

In short: put them in, choose a soothing sound in the app, and relax. These tiny, comfortable earbuds help block bothersome noises, guide you to sleep, and wake you gently—without waking anyone else. If you want a calmer, quieter night’s sleep, the Sleep A10 earbuds make it simple.
